      Classes in org.neo4j.kernel.impl.store.allocator that implement DynamicRecordAllocator 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ReusableRecordsAllocator
      Dynamic allocator that allow to use already available records in dynamic records allocation.
      class  ReusableRecordsCompositeAllocator
      Composite allocator that allows to use available records first and then switch to provided record allocator to allocate more records if required.
